metadata.title: Boao 5 Pairs Stretch Full Finger Mittens Knitted Gloves Winter Warm Kid Gloves for Baby Boys and Girls Supplies (1-4 Years Size)
features: Gloves utility: the gloves can cover your baby's whole hands, it can keep baby from scratching and keep hands warm in cold winter, allow you to apply them for a long time
Stretch mittens: S size gloves suitable for 1 - 4 years old children, M size gloves fit for 5 - 10 years old children, stretchable gloves easy to put on and take off
Where to use it: it not only as daily wear for your kids, but also can work as presents to share with your friends or families, different color of gloves can match with your kid's clothes well
Comfortable to wear: these knitted gloves are made of cotton, acrylic fibre and spandex materials, soft to touch and stretchable, non-toxic and non-odor, safe and durable for children to wear
What you get: you will get different color sets to choose from, each set has 6 pairs of toddler knitted gloves, you can select the set that you like
description: 5 Pairs stretch full finger mittens knitted gloves winter warm kid gloves for baby boys and girls suppliesFeatures:Gloves utility: The gloves can cover your baby's whole hands, it can avoid baby from scratching and keep hands warm in cold winter, allow you to apply them for a long time.Comfortable to wear: These knitted gloves are made of cotton, acrylic fiber and spandex materials, soft to touch and stretchable, non-toxic and non-odor, safe and durable for children to wear.Where to use it: It not only as daily wear for your kids, but also can work as presents to share with your friends or families, different color of gloves can match with your kid's clothes well.Specifications:Color: as pictures shownMaterial: cotton, acrylic fibre and spandexQuantity: 5 pairsPackage includes:5 Pairs of kid glovesNote:It may exist slight chromatic aberration.Machine wash and hand wash are available, easy to care.
